reviews.text: we were more than 25 people, and the service was exceptional. the restaurant is enough spacious, staff is fast and nice. the food was great and very generous, and personally i think it could have been better however considering all the rush and because it was full. i would to go try another try when it's calmer. the picture is the vegetarian option, and we order some feta on the side too with wine and drinks

The place was clean and tidy, and quite particular in its style. The plates were very big and filling, and they were also not expensive. The food was tasty and well combined. Unfortunately they didn't have the chicken. Overall good experience & would recommend if you want to eat Greek.

The Greek food here is very good, the prices are a little bit high but it is worth. The place is small, it's highly suggested to book the table before going to the restaurant. The service speed is average but the food amount is enormous
Excellent quality. One of the best foods I’ve ever tasted.

Good Greek restaurant. The quantity of dishes here is pretty large. And the taste is good. If you come here for lunch, it costs 10 to 15 euro. The most popular food there is gyro which is made from pork cooked on a vertical rotisserie. They cut gyro into small slices and serve it together with pancakes, vegetables and Greek sauces. It looks very similar as "kebab piatto". It is very good if you like meat.
